sentence.Network_en: He recalls his native Bombay with cinematic exactness.

sentence.Network_en: He pulled himself together and said, " No, we must come to exactness. "
sentence.Network_cn: 他鼓起精神来说: “ 现在我们必须把事情弄个明白. ”

sentence.Network_en: This demand for clarity of thought and exactness of definition left his victims confused and reeling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这种对思路清晰性和定义严密性的追求使被问者狼狈不堪,头晕目眩.

entry.def: Exactness is the quality of being very accurate and precise.

example.ex: He recalls his native Bombay with cinematic exactness.
example.tran: 对出生地孟买的回忆一幕幕清晰地呈现在他脑海里。
